entries.title: Recommendation A: Initial Evaluation
entries.snippet:
Perform initial clinical assessment and ultrasound for all suspicious nodules.
Assess patient history and risk factors
Neck ultrasound with nodule characterization
Consider FNA for nodules meeting size/risk criteria

entries.title: Legacy Approach: Routine follow-up schedule
entries.snippet: Suggest routine follow-up every 12 months for low-risk nodules.

entries.title: Terminology and Definitions
entries.snippet: Standardized terminology is used across these guidelines to ensure clarity.
